TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Shapes implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合, 这些对象代表文档中的所有形状或文档中所有页眉和页脚中的所有形状。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent all the shapes in a document or all the shapes in all the headers and footers in a document.

para.span: 每个 Shape 对象代表对象在绘图层中，如自选图形、 任意多边形、 OLE 对象或图片。

span.span: Each Shape object represents an object in the drawing layer, such as an AutoShape, freeform, OLE object, or picture.

para.span: 注释 如果要处理文档中的一部分形状 (例如, 只对文档中的自选图形或只对选定的形状执行某些操作), 则必须构造一个包含要使用的形状的集合。

span.span: Note If you want to work with a subset of the shapes on a document— for example, to do something to only the AutoShapes on the document or to only the selected shapes— you must construct a collection that contains the shapes you want to work with.

para.span: 使用属性返回Shapes集合。

span.span: Use the property to return the Shapes collection.

para.span: 注释 如果要同时对文档中的所有形状执行某些操作 (如删除或设置属性), 请使用方法创建一个ShapeRange对象, 该对象包含shapes集合中的所有形状, 然后应用适当的ShapeRange对象的属性或方法。

span.span: Note If you want to do something (like delete or set a property) to all the shapes on a document at the same time, use the method to create a ShapeRange object that contains all the shapes in the Shapes collection, and then apply the appropriate property or method to the ShapeRange object.

para.span: 使用Shapes集合的下列方法之一: 、 、、、、、、、、或 , 将形状添加到文档并返回形状表示新创建的形状的对象。

span.span: Use one of the following methods of the Shapes collection: , , , , , , , , , , or to add a shape to a document and return a Shape object that represents the newly created shape.

para.span: 使用Shapes(), 其中是名称或索引号, 返回单个Shape对象。

span.span: Use Shapes(), where is the name or the index number, to return a single Shape object.

para.span: 每个形状创建时分配一个默认名称。

span.span: Each shape is assigned a default name when it is created.

para.span: 例如，如果向文档中添加了三个不同的形状，它们可能会被命名为"矩形 2、"文本框 3"和"椭圆 4。

span.span: For example, if you add three different shapes to a document, they might be named "Rectangle 2," "TextBox 3," and "Oval 4."

para.span: 若要为形状指定更有意义的名称, 请设置属性。

span.span: To give a shape a more meaningful name, set the property.

para.span: Shapes 集合不包含对象。

span.span: The Shapes collection does not include objects.

para.span: InlineShape 对象被视为字符，并作为字符置于文本行中。

span.span: InlineShape objects are treated like characters and are positioned as characters within a line of text.

para.span: Shape 对象锁定到某一文本范围，但可以自由浮动，并且可以放置在页面上的任何位置。

span.span: Shape objects are anchored to a range of text but are free-floating and can be positioned anywhere on the page.

para.span: 您可以使用方法和方法将形状从一种类型转换为另一种类型。

span.span: You can use the method and the method to convert shapes from one type to the other.

para.span: 您可以将图片、 OLE 对象和 ActiveX 控件转换为嵌入式图形。

span.span: You can convert only pictures, OLE objects, and ActiveX controls to inline shapes.

para.span: 在文档中, 此集合的属性返回的只是正文中的项目数。

span.span: The property for this collection in a document returns the number of items in the main story only.

para.span: 若要对所有页眉和页脚中的形状进行计数, 请将shapes集合与任何对象一起使用。

span.span: To count the shapes in all the headers and footers, use the Shapes collection with any object.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddCallout (Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCalloutType Type, float Left, float Top, float Width, float Height, ref object Anchor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddCallout([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCalloutType Type, [in]float32 Left, [in]float32 Top, [in]float32 Width, [in]float32 Height, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed
Public Function AddCallout (Type As MsoCalloutType, Left As Single, Top As Single, Width As Single, Height As Single, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object) As Shape

param.name: Type
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 标注的类型。MsoCalloutType可为以下常量之一。

span.span: The type of callout.MsoCalloutType can be one of these constants.

param.span: msoCalloutOne –沿标注框的左边缘沿标注线直接向下放置。

span.span: msoCalloutOne – Positions callout line straight down along the left edge of the callout box.

param.span: msoCalloutTwo –将标注线沿对角线方向朝下和远离标注框的左边缘。

span.span: msoCalloutTwo – Positions callout line diagonally down and away from the left edge of the callout box.

param.span: msoCalloutThree –将标注线直接向下, 然后沿对角线从标注框的左边缘消失。

span.span: msoCalloutThree – Positions callout line straight out and then diagonally down and away from the left edge of the callout box.

param.span: msocalloutfour 类型–沿标注文本框的左边缘放置标注线。

span.span: msoCalloutFour – Positions callout line along the left edge of the callout text box.

param.span: msoCalloutMixed –指示一个区域或所选内容中存在多个MsoCalloutType的返回值。

span.span: msoCalloutMixed – A return value indicating that more than one MsoCalloutType exists in a range or selection.

param.name: Left
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标注边框左边缘的位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position, in points, of the left edge of the callout's bounding box.

param.name: Top
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标注边框上边缘的位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position, in points, of the top edge of the callout's bounding box.

param.name: Width
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标注边框的宽度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The width, in points, of the callout's bounding box.

param.name: Height
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标注边框的高度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The height, in points, of the callout's bounding box.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个对象, 表示标注绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the callout is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 而标注相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘进行定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the callout is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 向文档中添加无边框的线形标注。

span.span: Adds a borderless line callout to a document.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 该对象表示标注并将其添加到集合中。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the callout and adds it to the collection.

para.span: 您可以使用方法插入更多的注解, 如球标和云彩。

span.span: You can insert a greater variety of callouts, such as balloons and clouds, using the method.

param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.name: Height

param.span: 可选对象。

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，将自动选定锁定区域，而画布将相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘进行定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the canvas is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 该对象代表绘图画布并将其添加到集合中。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the drawing canvas and adds it to the collection.

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

para.span: 创建一个新的三维柱形图，然后将其添加到活动文档中。

span.span: Creates a new 3-D column chart and adds it to the active document.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddChart2 (int Style = -1, Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType Type = (Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType) -1, ref object Left, ref object Top, ref object Width, ref object Height, ref object Anchor, ref object NewLayout);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddChart2([in]int32 Style, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType Type, [in]object& Left, [in]object& Top, [in]object& Width, [in]object& Height, [in]object& Anchor, [in]object& NewLayout) runtime managed

Public Function AddChart2 (Optional Style As Integer = -1, Optional Type As XlChartType = (Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType) -1, Optional ByRef Left As Object, Optional ByRef Top As Object, Optional ByRef Width As Object, Optional ByRef Height As Object, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object, Optional ByRef NewLayout As Object) As Shape

param.name: Style
param.span: 图表样式。

span.span: The chart style.

param.name: Type
param.span: 图表类型。

span.span: The type of chart.

param.name: Left
param.span: 图表左边缘距离定位点的以磅为单位的位置。

span.span: The position, in points, of the left edge of the chart, relative to the anchor.

param.name: Top
param.span: 图表上边缘距离定位点的以磅为单位的位置。

span.span: The position, in points, of the top edge of the chart, relative to the anchor.

param.name: Width
param.span: 以磅为单位的图表宽度。

span.span: The width, in points, of the chart.

param.name: Height
param.span: 以磅为单位的图表高度。

span.span: The height, in points, of the chart.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 如果为 true, 将使用新的动态格式规则插入图表 (标题为打开, 并且图例仅在有多个系列时才打开)。

span.span: If is true, the chart will be inserted by using the new dynamic formatting rules (Title is on, and Legend is on only if there are multiple series).

param.name: NewLayout
param.span: 如果为 true, 则使用新的动态格式规则插入图表 (标题为打开, 并且图例仅在有多个系列时才打开)。

span.span: If is true, the chart is inserted by using the new dynamic formatting rules (Title is on, and Legend is on only if there are multiple series).

summary.span: 向文档添加图表。

span.span: Adds a chart to the document.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 该对象表示一个图表并将其添加到指定的集合。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a chart and adds it to the specified collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddCurve (ref object SafeArrayOfPoints, ref object Anchor);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddCurve([in]object& SafeArrayOfPoints, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed
Public Function AddCurve (ByRef SafeArrayOfPoints As Object, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object) As Shape

param.name: SafeArrayOfPoints
param.span: 必需的对象。

span.span: Required Object.

param.span: 由指定曲线的顶点和控制点的坐标对组成的数组。

span.span: An array of coordinate pairs that specifies the vertices and control points of the curve.

param.span: 首先指定起点，然后指定两个第一段贝塞尔曲线的控制点。

span.span: The first point you specify is the starting vertex, and the next two points are control points for the first Bézier segment.

param.span: 该曲线每增加一条线段，就要为其指定一个顶点和两个控制点。

span.span: Then, for each additional segment of the curve, you specify a vertex and two control points.

param.span: 最后指定该曲线的终点。

span.span: The last point you specify is the ending vertex for the curve.

param.span: 请注意，必须指定的点数始终为 3n + 1，其中 n 为曲线的线段个数。

span.span: Note that you must always specify 3n + 1 points, where n is the number of segments in the curve.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个对象, 表示该曲线绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the curve is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 而该曲线相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘进行定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the curve is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示文档中的贝赛尔曲线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a Bézier curve in a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddDiagram (Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoDiagramType Type, float Left, float Top, float Width, float Height, ref object Anchor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddDiagram([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoDiagramType Type, [in]float32 Left, [in]float32 Top, [in]float32 Width, [in]float32 Height, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed
Public Function AddDiagram (Type As MsoDiagramType, Left As Single, Top As Single, Width As Single, Height As Single, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object) As Shape

param.name: Type
param.span: 必需。MsoDiagramType可为以下常量之一。

span.span: Required .MsoDiagramType can be one of these constants.

param.span: msoDiagramCycle –显示一个持续循环的过程。

span.span: msoDiagramCycle – Shows a process with a continuous cycle.

param.span: msoDiagramMixed –不用于此方法。

span.span: msoDiagramMixed – Not used with this method.

param.span: msoDiagramOrgChart –显示层次结构关系。

span.span: msoDiagramOrgChart – Shows hierarchical relationships.

param.span: msoDiagramPyramid –显示基于基础的关系。

span.span: msoDiagramPyramid – Shows foundation-based relationships.

param.span: msoDiagramRadial –显示 core 元素的关系。

span.span: msoDiagramRadial – Shows relationships of a core element.

param.span: msoDiagramTarget –向目标显示步骤。

span.span: msoDiagramTarget – Shows steps toward a goal.

param.span: msoDiagramVenn –显示元素之间的重叠区域。

span.span: msoDiagramVenn – Shows areas of overlap between elements.

param.name: Left
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 图表的边界框左边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the left edge of the diagram's bounding box relative to the anchor.

param.name: Top
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 图表的边界框的上边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the top edge of the diagram's bounding box relative to the anchor.

param.name: Width
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 图表边界框的宽度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The width, measured in points, of the diagram's bounding box.

param.name: Height
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 图的边界框的高度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The height, measured in points, of the diagram's bounding box.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个对象, 表示图表绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the diagram is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 图表相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the diagram is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示文档中新创建的图表。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a newly created diagram in a document.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddLabel (Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTextOrientation Orientation, float Left, float Top, float Width, float Height, ref object Anchor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddLabel([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoTextOrientation Orientation, [in]float32 Left, [in]float32 Top, [in]float32 Width, [in]float32 Height, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed

param.name: Orientation
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 文本的方向。MsoTextOrientation可以是下列常量之一: msoTextOrientationDownward msoTextOrientationHorizontal msoTextOrientationHorizontalRotatedFarEast msoTextOrientationMixed msoTextOrientationUpward msoTextOrientationVertical msoTextOrientationVerticalFarEast某些常量可能不可用, 具体取决于您选择的语言支持 (例如, 美国英语) 或了.

span.span: The orientation of the text.MsoTextOrientation can be one of the following constants: msoTextOrientationDownward msoTextOrientationHorizontal msoTextOrientationHorizontalRotatedFarEast msoTextOrientationMixed msoTextOrientationUpward msoTextOrientationVertical msoTextOrientationVerticalFarEast Some of these constants may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you’ve selected or installed.

param.name: Left
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标签左边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the left edge of the label relative to the anchor.

param.name: Top
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标签上边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the top edge of the label relative to the anchor.

param.name: Width
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标签的宽度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The width of the label, in points.

param.name: Height
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 标签的高度（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The height of the label, in points.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个对象, 表示标签绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the label is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 且标签相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the label is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 向文档中添加文本标签。

span.span: Adds a text label to a document.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示该文本标签并将其添加到集合中。

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddLine (float BeginX, float BeginY, float EndX, float EndY, ref object Anchor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddLine([in]float32 BeginX, [in]float32 BeginY, [in]float32 EndX, [in]float32 EndY, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed
Public Function AddLine (BeginX As Single, BeginY As Single, EndX As Single, EndY As Single, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object) As Shape

param.name: BeginX
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 直线起点相对于锚点的水平位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The horizontal position, measured in points, of the line's starting point, relative to the anchor.

param.name: BeginY
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: The vertical position, measured in points, of the line's starting point, relative to the anchor.

param.name: EndX
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 必需Single。

param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 且标签相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the label is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

param.span: 可选对象。

param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 新对象的左边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position (in points) of the left edge of the new object relative to the anchor.

param.name: Top
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 新对象的上边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

param.span: ActiveX 控件的宽度 (以磅为单位)。

param.name: Height
param.span: 可选对象。ActiveX 控件的高度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Optional Object.The height of the ActiveX control, in points.

param.span: 可选对象。

param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: The file from which the object is to be created.

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the current folder is used.

span.span: You must specify either the or argument for the object, but not both.

param.name: LinkToFile
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: OptionalObject.

param.span: 真 若要将 OLE 对象链接到创建它的文件。

span.span: True to link the OLE object to the file from which it was created.

param.span: 假 以使 OLE 对象成为独立复的文件。

span.span: False to make the OLE object an independent copy of the file.

param.span: 如果为指定的值, 则该参数必须为False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: DisplayAsIcon
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 若要将 OLE 对象显示为图标。

param.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: IconFileName
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含将要显示的图标的文件。

span.span: The file that contains the icon to be displayed.

param.name: IconIndex
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

span.span: The order of icons in the specified file corresponds to the order in which the icons appear in the Change Icon dialog box (Insert menu, Object dialog box) when the Display as icon check box is selected.

param.span: 文件中的第一个图标的索引号是 0 (零)。

span.span: The first icon in the file has the index number 0 (zero).

param.span: 如果具有给定索引号的图标在中不存在, 则使用索引号为1的图标 (文件中的第二个图标)。

span.span: If an icon with the given index number doesn't exist in , the icon with the index number 1 (the second icon in the file) is used.

param.span: 默认值为 0 (零)。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero).

span.span: A preset text effect.

param.span: 可读 常数的值对应于 艺术字库对话框 (从左到右，从上到下编号) 中列出的格式。

span.span: The values of the MsoPresetTextEffect constants correspond to the formats listed in the WordArt Gallery dialog box (numbered from left to right and from top to bottom).

param.name: Text
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 艺术字中的文字。

span.span: The text in the WordArt.

param.name: FontName
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 艺术字中所用字体的名称。

span.span: The name of the font used in the WordArt.

param.name: FontSize
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 艺术字中使用的字体的大小 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The size, in points, of the font used in the WordArt.

param.name: FontBold
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 属性值为 MsoTrue 为艺术字字体加粗。

span.span: MsoTrue to bold the WordArt font.

param.name: FontItalic
param.span: 必需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 属性值为 MsoTrue ，以斜体显示艺术字。

span.span: MsoTrue to italicize the WordArt font.

param.name: Left
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 艺术字形状左边缘相对于锁定标记的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the left edge of the WordArt shape relative to the anchor.

param.name: Top
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 相对于锁定标记的艺术字形状的上边缘的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the top edge of the WordArt shape relative to the anchor.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 可选对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个对象, 表示艺术字绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the WordArt is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 而艺术字相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the WordArt is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 向文档中添加一个 "艺术字" 图形。

span.span: Adds a WordArt shape to a document.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 该对象代表艺术字并将其添加到集合中。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the WordArt and adds it to the collection.

para.span: 向文档添加艺术字对象时，该对象的高度和宽度将自动根据所指定的文字的大小和数量来设置。

span.span: When you add WordArt to a document, the height and width of the WordArt are automatically set based on the size and amount of text you specify.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddWebVideo (string EmbedCode, ref object VideoWidth, ref object VideoHeight, ref object PosterFrameImage, ref object Url, ref object Left, ref object Top, ref object Width, ref object Height, ref object Anchor);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Shape AddWebVideo([in]string EmbedCode, [in]object& VideoWidth, [in]object& VideoHeight, [in]object& PosterFrameImage, [in]object& Url, [in]object& Left, [in]object& Top, [in]object& Width, [in]object& Height, [in]object& Anchor) runtime managed

Public Function AddWebVideo (EmbedCode As String, ByRef VideoWidth As Object, ByRef VideoHeight As Object, Optional ByRef PosterFrameImage As Object, Optional ByRef Url As Object, Optional ByRef Left As Object, Optional ByRef Top As Object, Optional ByRef Width As Object, Optional ByRef Height As Object, Optional ByRef Anchor As Object) As Shape

param.name: EmbedCode
param.span: 要嵌入的 HTML 代码。

span.span: The HTML code to embed.

param.name: VideoWidth
param.span: 一个整数, 表示 web 视频的宽度 (以像素为单位)。

span.span: An integer that represents the width of the web video in pixels.

param.name: VideoHeight
param.span: 一个整数, 表示 web 视频的高度 (以像素为单位)。

span.span: An integer that represents the height of the web video in pixels.

param.name: PosterFrameImage
param.span: 指向要用作 web 视频海报框架的文件的字符串。

span.span: A string that points to the file to use as the poster frame for the web video.

param.name: Url
param.span: 一个包含指向 web 视频的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the URL to the web video.

param.name: Left
param.span: 标牌框架左边缘距文档边缘的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the left edge of the poster frame from the edge of the document.

param.name: Top
param.span: 标牌框架上边缘距文档边缘的位置 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The position, measured in points, of the top edge of the poster frame from the edge of the document.

param.name: Width
param.span: 文档中标牌帧的宽度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The width, measured in points, of the poster frame in the document.

param.name: Height
param.span: 文档中标牌帧的高度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: The height, measured in points, of the poster frame in the document.

param.name: Anchor
param.span: 一个对象, 表示 web 视频绑定到的文本。

span.span: A object that represents the text to which the web video is bound.

param.span: 如果指定, 则锁定标记位于锁定区域中第一段的开头。

span.span: If is specified, the anchor is positioned at the beginning of the first paragraph in the anchoring range.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则自动选定锁定区域, 而视频相对于页面的上边缘和左边缘进行定位。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the anchoring range is selected automatically and the video is positioned relative to the top and left edges of the page.

summary.span: 向文档中添加新的 web 视频。

span.span: Adds a new web video to the document.

public: Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::FreeformBuilder ^ BuildFreeform(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoEditingType EditingType, float X1, float Y1);

param.name: EditingType
param.span: 第一个顶点的编辑属性。

span.span: The editing property of the first node.

param.span: 必需。MsoEditingType可以是下列常量之一 (不能是msoEditingSmooth或msoEditingSymmetric)。

span.span: Required .MsoEditingType can be either of these constants (cannot be msoEditingSmooth or msoEditingSymmetric).

param.name: X1
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

span.span: The position (in points) of the first node in the freeform drawing relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

param.name: Y1
param.span: 必需Single。

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 任意图形中第一个节点相对于文档左上角的位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position (in points) of the first node in the freeform drawing relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

summary.span: 建立任意多边形对象。

span.span: Builds a freeform object.

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示正在生成的任意多边形。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the freeform as it is being built.

para.span: 使用方法将线段添加到任意多边形。

span.span: Use the method to add segments to the freeform.

para.span: 向任意多边形添加了至少一个线段之后, 可以使用方法将FreeformBuilder对象转换为具有您在FreeformBuilder对象中定义的几何说明的对象。

span.span: After you have added at least one segment to the freeform, you can use the method to convert the FreeformBuilder object into a object that has the geometric description you've defined in the FreeformBuilder object.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Count { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer

summary.span: 返回指定集合中的项目数。

span.span: Returns the number of items in the specified collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的, 则此属性返回十六进制数字是 4d535744, 表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用, 其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange Range (ref object Index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ShapeRange Range([in]object& Index) runtime managed
Public Function Range (ByRef Index As Object) As ShapeRange
public: Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::ShapeRange ^ Range(System::Object ^ % Index);

param.name: Index
param.span: 必需的对象。

span.span: Required Object.

param.span: 指定要包含在指定范围中的形状。

span.span: Specifies which shapes are to be included in the specified range.

param.span: 可以是一个整数, 用于指定形状在集合中的索引号、指定形状名称的字符串或包含整数或字符串的对象数组。

span.span: Can be an integer that specifies the index number of a shape within the collection, a string that specifies the name of a shape, or an Object array that contains integers or strings.

summary.span: 返回一个对象。

span.span: Returns a object.

para.span: 字符位置值从文档开头算起，起始值为 0（零）。

span.span: Character position values begin with 0 (zero) at the beginning of the document.

para.span: 将计算所有字符，包括非打印字符。

span.span: All characters are counted, including nonprinting characters.

para.span: 隐藏字符即便未显示也计算在内。

span.span: Hidden characters are counted even if they're not displayed.

para.span: 如果不指定Range方法的起始和结束字符位置, 则整个文档以对象的形式返回。

span.span: If you don't specify starting and ending character positions for the Range method, the entire document is returned as a object.

para.span: ShapeRange对象不包含对象。

span.span: ShapeRange objects don't include objects.

para.span: InlineShape 对象等效于一个字符，并定位为一个文本范围内的一个字符。

span.span: An InlineShape object is equivalent to a character and is positioned as a character within a range of text.

para.span: 对象定位到文本区域 (默认情况下为选定内容), 但它们可以放置在页面上的任何位置。

span.span: objects are anchored to a range of text (the selection, by default), but they can be positioned anywhere on the page.

para.span: Shape对象将始终显示在其锁定的区域所在的同一页上。

span.span: A Shape object will always appear on the same page as the range it's anchored to.

para.span: [!注释] 与 形状 对象可以执行的大多数操作还可以执行与一个 ShapeRange 对象，该对象包含一个形状。某些操作，一个 ShapeRange 对象，该对象包含多个形状，在执行时产生错误。

span.span: Most operations that you can do with a Shape object you can also do with a ShapeRange object that contains a single shape. Some operations, when performed on a ShapeRange object that contains multiple shapes, produce an error.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SelectAll ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SelectAll() runtime managed
Public Sub SelectAll ()
public: void SelectAll();

summary.span: 选择主要文章、画布或文档的页眉和页脚中的所有形状。

span.span: Selects all the shapes in the main story, in a canvas, or in headers and footers of a document.

para.span: 此方法不选择对象。

span.span: This method doesn't select objects.
